// actionbar text Settings Help Select Analyze HelpActivity ListActivity // titles text Instruction List of Ingredients // displayed text "How to use the app:

"
"1. Select picture of the ingredient list from the gallery
" "2. Wait until recognised text will appear below the image
" "3. Press star button to analyze the ingredients of the product
" "4. Ingredients and their description will appear on the list
" "5. Enjoy


"
